properties.areaDesc: Eagle River to Manitou Island MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 8 at 10:56AM EST until January 9 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 25 to 35 kt with
gusts up to 45 kt and waves 7 to 10 feet expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, north winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to
25 kt and waves 4 to 7 feet occurring.

* WHERE...Eagle River to Manitou Island MI.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 4 AM to 7 PM EST Thursday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY
